name: Splatoon™ Testfire
description: The Splatoon Summer Splatdown is back! To celebrate the final days of summer vacation, we're offering a special chance to get your feet wet in the Splatoon Testfire demo! Jump online and fight it out in fast and furious 4-on-4 Turf War battles! This free demo event will only be active during a few short time periods between 8/25 and 8/28. Don’t miss this free chance to get inked! You'll need a broadband Internet connection to participate in the Splatoon Testfire demo. To join, download the free Splatoon Testfire special demo from Nintendo eShop for Wii U, and then launch the demo during one of the designated time periods! Event times (You can only play during these time periods) 8/25 (Thu) 3:00 p.m. – 5:00 p.m. PT 8/26 (Fri) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT 8/27 (Sat) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT 8/28 (Sun) 3:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. PT
